## SavedObjectsClientFactory type

Describes the factory used to create instances of the Saved Objects Client.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type SavedObjectsClientFactory<Request = unknown> = ({ request, }: {
    request: Request;
}) => SavedObjectsClientContract;
```
